column4: hi, im trying to install a package with Gdebi it says it depends on "libwnck18" wich im sure it is installed, why can it be?
try on the command line with sudo dpkg -i *.deb
ok

well the problem is with the version, i have installed version 2.14 and i need 2.18, when i try to install 2.18 it depends on libwcnk-common(2.18) when i try to install this one, i get an error because i have installed a newr version, what can i do in this case?
this package isn't made for ubuntu, probably it's for debian. i wouldn't recommend using it
wich package do you refer?
what are you trying to install ?
avant navigator
in Gutsy
you can only try to build from source
ok
sudo /etc/init.d/samba restart
thks
if you want flash and codecs then stick with 32-bit. The performance gain of 64bit isn't worth the trouble
codecs have trubles?
w32codecs... wmv9 and stuff
ikonia isnt it very sad to have a 64bit machine and dont use the whole of its capacities?

tbeory and practice. in a perfect world we would have all software available in 64bit and fully 64bit optimized algo's. the parctice is: the performance gain is minimal, because most software isn't 64 bit optimized, or even available for 64bit. so you need a 32bit chroot on a 64bit machine and ugly stuff like that
ok thanks very much
i thought with gutsy most of the problems were gone
'gutsy' and 'problems gone' don't fit into one sentence :-\
